bcbio-gff
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which bcbio-gff installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using bcbio-gff, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load bcbio-gff/0.7.0-foss-2022b
```
